# HCC5hmc

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.com/12379Monty/HCC5hmc.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/12379Monty/HCC5hmc)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains data on genome-wide mapping of 5-hydroxymethylcytosines
in circulating cell-free DNA as reported in Cai J, Chen L, Zhang Z, et al. Gut
2019;68:2195â€“2205.

## Installation

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) can be installed with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("12379Monty/HCC5hmc")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(HCC5hmc)
## basic example code
```
